dict.acceptation: 先锋；厢式货车；增值网；先驱，前驱，领袖，领导人；

sent.orig: Actually, about twenty years ago, EDI(Electronic Data Interchange) system based on VAN(Value-Added Network) was present.
sent.trans: 实际上，早在二十多年前就出现了基于VAN（增值网络）的EDI（电子数据交换）系统。

sent.orig: The modified HLLEW (Harten-Lax-van Leer-Einfeldt-Wada)scheme is used for the solution of fluid equations.
sent.trans: 其中流体计算的空间离散采用改进的HLLEW(Harten—Lax-van Leer-Einfeldt-Wada)格式。

sent.orig: There was also a pick-up version and a panel van called a Cube Van.
sent.trans: 还有回升版本和一个小组货车称为立方范。

sent.orig: When Gaines and his men approach the van, Jack at the gas tank the van explodes.
sent.trans: 当盖恩斯及其手下接近那辆客货两用车时，杰克向汽油箱开枪，车爆炸了。

sent.orig: Van is a city in eastern Turkey on the shores of Lake Van.
sent.trans: 凡城是土耳其东部的一个城市，在凡湖边上。
